mapper.select: SELECT r.RE_NO, r.CREAT_DT, r.ME_ID, d.ORDT_ID, p.PRDT_ID, h.ORDR_DATE, p.PRDT_NM FROM review r JOIN ORDER_DETAIL d ON r.ORDT_ID = d.ORDT_ID JOIN ORDER_HEADER h ON d.ORDR_ID = h.ORDR_ID JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.PRDT_ID = r.PRDT_ID ORDER BY 2 DESC

SELECT r.RE_NO, r.CREAT_DT, r.ME_ID, d.ORDT_ID, p.PRDT_ID, h.ORDR_DATE, p.PRDT_NM FROM review r JOIN ORDER_DETAIL d ON r.ORDT_ID = d.ORDT_ID JOIN ORDER_HEADER h ON d.ORDR_ID = h.ORDR_ID JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.PRDT_ID = r.PRDT_ID
AND r.me_id LIKE '%' || #{meId} || '%'
AND p.prdt_nm LIKE '%' || #{prdtNm} || '%'
AND p.prdt_id LIKE '%' || #{prdtId} || '%'
AND d.ordt_id LIKE '%' || #{ordtId} || '%'
AND r.creat_dt >= #{start}
AND TRUNC(r.creat_dt) <= #{end}
ORDER BY 2 DESC
